<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1118) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Halcyon Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=30)

**Prerequisites**
[Halcyon Speaker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1115)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases. You gain two common 2nd-level halcyon spells and two 3rd-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 2nd-level halcyon spell slot and a 3rd-level halcyon spell slot. These and all future halcyon spell slots work like the 1st-level halcyon spell slot you gained from Halcyon Speaker Dedication.

<title level="2">Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate leads to...</title>
[Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1121), [Halcyon Spellcasting Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=1122), [Synergistic Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1125)
name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
